titleStmt.title: The four wonders of this land, which unto you we will declare: the Lord's great mercy it is great; God give us grace to stand in fear, and watch and pray both night and day, that God may give us all his grace, to repent our sins then every one, our time is going on apace. Tune of Dear Love regard my grief, &c. Licensed according to order.

The four wonders of this land, which unto you we will declare: the Lord's great mercy it is great; God give us grace to stand in fear, and watch and pray both night and day, that God may give us all his grace, to repent our sins then every one, our time is going on apace. Tune of Dear Love regard my grief, &c. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
